item.title: Blocked drain by kerb, 3rd December
item.description:
The drain on the corner by the toad into the industrial estate is blocked. It was full and the road had a huge puddle stretching across the road when we had rain earlier in the week.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Unit 4C, Alstone Lane Trading Estate, Hatherley, Cheltenham

item.title: Neighbours Visitors parking over driveway, 2nd December
item.description:
My neighbours visitors continually park across my driveway making it very difficult to enter or exit my driveway. I am just about to buy my third child a car which means we have 5 cars which we park on the driveway. I wouldn’t like there to be any accidents due to the nature of the parking directly opposite our driveway.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Pansy Gardens, Wheatpieces, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Traffic light timings are off, 2nd December
item.description:
Where Cheltenham Road east meets Pirton lane. New traffic lights- second green arrow doesn’t go green on right only for traffic turning right from Elmbridge court direction. Timings too short for main road traffic compared to joining road (Pirton fields). Pause between cycles are too long. Traffic has backed up onto Elmbridge court roundabout which is dangerous (never been an issue before)
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Cheltenham Road East, Churchdown, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: Green or amber traffic light is not working

item.title: Traffic lights not properly synchronised, 2nd December
item.description:
The traffic light at this junction is not properly synchronised to allow for good traffic flow. Every weekday I’m getting stuck on the Elmbridge Court roundabout from the tailbacks these lights are causing. It seems they go entirely red for long periods of time, where no vehicles can move. Pedestrian lights also aren’t green
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Cheltenham Road East, Churchdown, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: Green or amber traffic light is not working
